step_feedback.feedback: Good job bringing your arms in front of your chest and making fists.  Your arm extension was smooth and controlled.
Remember to fully extend your arms horizontally to shoulder height while exhaling. Try to maintain a consistent rhythm.
Focus on coordinating your breathing with your arm movements. Inhale as you bring your arms in, exhale as you extend them.
Try to keep your movements smoother and more controlled.  Ensure your arms are fully extended horizontally.
Good effort!  Try to maintain a consistent rhythm and focus on the full range of motion for each repetition.

exercise_summary: You performed the Horizontal Pumping exercise. Remember to fully extend your arms horizontally, coordinate your breathing with the movements, and maintain a consistent rhythm.  Focus on smooth, controlled movements for best results.
